class clap.modules.spits.MultiInstanceAPI(platform_db: str, repository_type: str, default_driver: str)¶

API used to manage and perform operations in cluster and nodes from different driver implementations, and cloud providers in a transparently manner.

Create a new Endpoint to the connect to process and perform the handshake with jobid and start communication

Return type

SimpleEndpoint

clap.modules.spits.__query_job_status(job_id: str, remote_exec_path: str, ssh: SSHClient)¶

Query the status of a running job in a node. The status runs the spits-job-status and cat the resulting string.

Parameters

  • job_id (str) – ID of the job the perform the query

  • remote_exec_path (str) – Path with spits scripts to run

  • ssh (SSHClient) – Connected SSH Client with the node to execute commands

Returns

The job status dictionary containing:

  • finished: 0 if job was not terminated 1 otherwise

  • nodes:

    • manager: ‘jobmanager’ or ‘taskmanager’

    • type: ‘node’

    • address: IP Address of the node

    • port: Port of the node

    • pid: PID of the process in node

Return type

dict

clap.modules.spits.__is_process_alive(process: SpitsProcessInfo) → bool¶

Establishes a connection to the process and send a heartbeat (to query if it is alive)

Parameters

process (SpitsProcessInfo) – Process to query information

Returns

True if heartbeat is successed (node is alive) false otherwise

Return type

bool
